dmca.title: Google Asked to Remove Links to Story "Seduction" (#15)
dmca.body:
Under Sections 5 12(g)(2) and (3) of the DMCA, I hereby notify Google that my copyrighted work, entitled "Seduction", is being infringed, and I request removal of all infringing materials from Google's indexes and cache.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the web pages of the infringing URLs listed below. All of these sites are infringing that work, as I have not authorized its publication.

Here is a search query that returns all of the infringing pages:
hup://www. google. com/search?q
